articles.title: Spokesman of Policy Department of NDC Blasts S. Korean Authorities' False Rumor about DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman of Policy Department of NDC Blasts S. Korean Authorities' False Rumor about DPRK
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK Sunday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet authorities spread a wild rumor while forcibly linking the recent extra-large hacking in the U.S. with the DPRK:
					 The SONY Pictures, a film producer in the U.S., has reportedly been attacked by hackers. 
					
					 The hacking is so fatal that all the systems of the company have been paralyzed, causing the overall suspension of the work and supposedly a huge ensuing loss. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. mobilized many investigation bodies including FBI, CIA and the Department of Homeland Security for urgent investigation and recovery of the system.
					
					 We do not know where in America the SONY Pictures is situated and for what wrongdoings it became the target of the attack nor we feel the need to know about it. 
					
					 But what we clearly know is that the SONY Pictures is the very one which was going to produce a film abetting a terrorist act while hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by taking advantage of the hostile policy of the U.S. administration towards the DPRK. 
					
					 We already called upon the world to turn out in the just struggle to put an end to U.S. imperialism, the chieftain of aggression and the worst human rights abuser that tramples down the universal rights of people to peaceful and stable life and violates the sovereignty of other countries, as well as its followers. 
					
					 The hacking into the SONY Pictures might be a righteous deed of the supporters and sympathizers with the DPRK in response to its appeal.
					
					 What matters here is that the U.S. set the DPRK as the target of the investigation, far from reflecting on its wrongdoings and being shameful of being taken unawares. And the south Korean group, keen on serving its master, groundlessly linked the hacking attack with the DPRK and floated the "story about the north's involvement", an indication of its inveterate bitterness towards its country fellowmen.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet group are all accustomed to pulling up others for no specific reason when something undesirable happens in their own land.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group went the lengths of floating the false rumor that the north was involved in the hacking that happened in the U.S., a country far across the ocean.
					
					 It should be well aware that it can not evade the severe punishment by the anti-U.S. sacred war to be staged all over the world if it blindly curries favor with the U.S. as now. 
					
					 The U.S. should also know that there are a great number of supporters and sympathizers with the DPRK all over the world as well as the "champions of peace" who attacked the SONY Pictures.
					
					 The righteous reaction will get stronger to smash the evil doings.

articles.title: Congratulations to Uruguayan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Uruguayan President
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in a message on Dec. 1 congratulated Tabare Vasquez upon his reelection as president of the Oriental Republic of Uruguay.
					 The message expressed belief that friendly bonds would be made between the DPRK and Uruguay in the near future in line with the common desire of the peoples of the DPRK and Uruguay for peace and friendship.
					
					 It also wished the Uruguayan president good health and big successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Mongolian Democratic Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to Mongolian Democratic Party
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the Central Executive Committee of the Mongolian Democratic Party on Dec. 5 on the occasion of its 14th founding anniversary.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would as ever develop on good terms, the message wished the Mongolian Democratic Party bigger successes in its work for the prosperity and development of Mongolia.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea Disclosed
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of various organizations including the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" held a press conference on Dec. 1 to disclose the fact that human rights abuses are getting serious on charges of violation of the evil "Security Law" in south Korea. 
					 The south Korean security authorities restrict the freedom of expression by invoking the "Security Law". 
					
					 At the press conference speakers said that the cases that were charged with the violation of the "Security Law" increased a lot under the present regime. 
					
					 They expressed concern over the ordinance of deleting stories posted on Internet, contending that it was a serious problem violating the basic rights of the people.

articles.title: S. Korean Artist Denounces Fascist Dictatorial Ruler
articles.content:
S. Korean Artist Denounces Fascist Dictatorial Ruler
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- South Korean artist Hong Song Dam denounced the group of Park Geun Hye keen on the fascist dictatorship rule, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Dec. 3. 
					 Immeasurable are the human rights abuses under the present authorities including the case of the attempted rebellion of the Unified Progressive Party, sinking of the ferry "Sewol", construction of naval base on Jeju Island, the case of Ssangyong Motors and the case of death of Private Yun by violence, Hong said, and went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye brings back the era three or four decades ago. She invested Jong Yun Hoe, the chief of presidential security and others with authority even though they are responsible for corruption cases, and reduced the "prime minister" into a puppet. 
					
					 She is establishing an abnormal and distorted dictatorial ruling system. 
					
					 Now is the time to wage anti-Park Geun Hye struggle.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Moves
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Moves
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities make desperate efforts to refer the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" to the UN Security Council within this year, while calling for eliciting "sympathy" and putting "pressure on the north".  They say that the replacement of the non-permanent member nations of the UNSC next January would render the "inclusion of the north Korean human rights issue in the agenda items obscure". 
					 This is the unpardonable crime as it is an intentional provocation to bedevil the north-south relations by rattling the nerves of the army and people of the DPRK, justify their moves of confrontation with the fellow countrymen and stifle the DPRK at any cost, Minju Joson Sunday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" is a political fraud cooked up by the U.S. and the puppet forces to overwhelm justice with injustice and cover up the truth with falsity, and the height of shamelessness aimed to realize the ambition for the invasion of the north. 
					
					 That is why the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in its statement solemnly declared that it flatly rejects the "resolution" fabricated by the U.S. and its allies and that it will take the toughest measure in history to mercilessly smash the smear "human rights" campaign against it. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities have gone so absurd to refer the "resolution" to the UNSC. This is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's warning. 
					
					 Their sinister intention is to intensify anti-DPRK propaganda by bringing false document up for discussion at the UNSC. 
					
					 The persistent moves of the south Korean authorities getting hell-bent on confrontation with the fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces clearly prove that they are confrontational maniacs and filthy stooges of the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails South Korean Authorities' Psychological Offensive against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails South Korean Authorities' Psychological Offensive against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Christians of south Korea (Hangichong) inaugurated a promotion committee for building the Aegibong Light Tower and is raising funds for the tower reconstruction.  
					 Hangichong, south Korean conservative religious organization specializing in breeding anti-DPRK plots, is now busy to set up temporary facilities on the site where the tower had been standing to light up the area during the Christmas season this year. 
					
					 It is reportedly said that the south Korean puppet defence ministry officially allowed the reconstruction of the light tower.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Sunday in a commentary says this is a well-known fact that whenever the tower was lit by the south Korean puppet forces in the past, the situation along the military demarcation line was strained.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The consent to the light tower reconstruction by the puppet defence ministry shows that all the moves related to the light tower are a result of the anti-DPRK hostile policy of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive was reported to have been upset by the dismantlement of the light tower.
					
					 After that, the south Korean puppet group opened to public and pushed ahead with the plan to set up bigger psychological means by spending a huge amount of money totaling tens of billions of won. 
					
					 Hangichong is just a cat's-paw of the south Korean authorities obsessed with the anti-DPRK confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities responsible for frustrating the north-south high level contact through the anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations leave no stone unturned to provoke the DPRK with saber-rattling in collusion with the U.S. and anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 The developments show who stands in the way of the inter-Korean improvement and brings the war crisis.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Protest Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Protest Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and a member of the Russia-cross Korean peninsula car riding group on Nov. 27 made public a statement in protest against the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" cooked up by the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" proved once again the double standards practiced by the U.S. and its followers, the statement denounced, and went on:
					
					 More than half of American citizens are subject to racism and innocent black men were shot to death by white policemen in broad daylight. This leaves the U.S. with no right to deal with the human rights issue.
					
					 The international community should adopt its own attitude based on reality and impartiality and stop practicing double standards at the instruction of the U.S.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which should be taken to the human rights court as it causes all sorts of crimes and evils.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in DR Congo and round-table talks and film shows in Iran and Germany on Nov. 29 and Dec. 1 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films documenting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and Songun leadership feats of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter and speakers including Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, and Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo who doubles as chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, praised Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea and turning the DPRK into the land of bliss for the people and an invincible power.
					
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, indicating the road to be followed by the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and opened a turning phase for building a thriving nation with his original Songun policy.
					
					 Kim Jong Un brought about world-startling miracles and changes in building a thriving nation and is wisely leading the drive for improving the inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country, true to the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised Kim Jong Il for glorifying the brilliant history and culture of the DPRK and the Korean nation all over the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Moscow on December 1 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and publications introducing successes achieved by the Korean army and people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Present there were personages of the said central committee and organizations under it and the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on a visit to Russia.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, highly praised the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il who provided a firm military guarantee for the prosperity and happiness of the county and people with his unique Songun politics and firmly defended the global peace and security, affirming that he would always live in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 Makarov, chairman of the Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Russian league, praised Kim Jong Il for containing military threats from the U.S. imperialists with the powerful army.
					
					 Revedev, chief of the Moscow Branch of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, noted that the DPRK is a socialist country where everything serves the people and top priority is given to the people's interests, adding that all these would have been unthinkable without Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Juche idea and defended socialism with the army.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched a Korean film.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Brazilian Organization
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK featured articles on its website on Dec. 1 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Those articles were titled "Shining star of Mt. Paektu", "Thunder over Jongil Peak" under the caption "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il."
					
					 Mt. Paektu, the ancestral mountain of the Korean nation and the sacred mountain of the Korean revolution, would be unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il, the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, an article said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born on Mt. Paektu, a key base of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, on February 16, 1942.
					
					 At that time, anti-Japanese fighters wrote such letters as "O, we herald birth of shining star of Mt. Paektu" and "Long live shining star which emerged, shedding its rays all over land of Korea" on barked trees, hoping that Kim Jong Il would become a bright star who will glorify Korea in the future by carrying forward the cause of General Kim Il Sung, the sun of the Korean nation.
					
					 Entering Kim Il Sung University, he composed the poem "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee." 
					
					 This poem reflected his will to be responsible for the destiny of Korea and lead it to the bright future, true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Referring in detail to the fact that the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a satellite producing and launching country and a nuclear weapons state, thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, it said his august name and exploits will shine forever along with Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Democrate Publishing House of France on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The work published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il. It also indicates essence and originality of his Songun revolutionary idea and tasks for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Austria
articles.content:
Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Austria
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A youth group for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism was inaugurated in Austria on Nov. 26.
					 Maximilian Christian was elected chief of the group.
					
					 The group set it as an aim of its activities to deeply study Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and give wide publicity to the reality of the DPRK among the Austrian people.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Supported by Nigerian Organization
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Dec. 1 posted on its internet website an article titled "Realistic and reasonable proposal for Korea's reunification". 
					Division of Korea has brought immeasurable sufferings to the Korean people who had lived as a homogeneous nation for 5 000 years. It also posed constant threat to the world peace and security, the article said, and went on:
					
					Under the condition that there are different ideas and social systems in the north and the south of Korea, reunification by way of one side swallowing the other will bring only disasters to the nation and the region. 
					
					Federal formula is the best way for reunification. 
					
					President Kim Il Sung put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					
					He worked heart and soul all his life for the reunification of Korea. 
					
					The proposal paved a new path for building a federal state.
					
					It is the most reasonable one for a reunified state as it fully reflects the common demand and interests of the nation, and helps to achieve national unity irrespective of differences of ideas and social systems. 
					
					The international community sincerely hopes that Korea will be reunified independently and peacefully by federal formula.

articles.title: Internet Seminar Held in Nepal
articles.content:
Internet Seminar Held in Nepal
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- An internet seminar took place in Katmandu, Nepal on Nov. 29 to mark the 3rd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. It was co-sponsored by the Nepal Journalist Association, the Nepal Friendship Association and the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea.
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association who is deputy director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, addressed the seminar.
					
					 He referred to the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Praising him as the greatest man, the chairman said that he brought about a miraculous victory to the DPRK while making a long journey of Songun. His august name and feats will shine forever along with history, the chairman stressed.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Phanindra Raj Pant, secretary general of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Subash Kaji Shrestha, chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for defending not only the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK but the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world with his Songun revolutionary leadership, praising him as a peerlessly brilliant commander possessed of talented strategy and commanding art.
					
					 The Songun idea and cause of Kim Jong Il are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
